titles.title: To provide that no Federal funds may be obligated for any purpose with respect to the Berz-Macomb airport in Macomb County, Michigan, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Prohibits the obligation of funds for any purpose with respect to the Berz-Macomb Airport in Macomb County, Michigan. Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to study and report to the Congress on the feasibility of reducing the impact of aircraft noise on residential neighborhoods in the vicinity of such airport.
